ResearchProjectDef.label: Flesh Adaptation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further study into social interactions revealed that interactions are heavily influenced by physical appearance. By using this information your researchers discovered another purpose for the nanites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Networked Healing Factors
ResearchProjectDef.description: By combining the blood replacement research and the healing knowledge you got from the techprint. You can most certain make a networked version of the coagulator and healing enhancer.
